The health bar in Minecraft is represented by a row of red hearts at the bottom of the screen. In this image, all the hearts are filled, indicating that the player has maximum health. Each heart represents two hearts in the game, so a full health bar consists of 10 hearts. When a player takes damage, some or all of these hearts will be empty. When all hearts are full, as shown here, the player is at maximum health.
